ygData.subject: Re: Jewelry and skill raises
ygData.msgSnippet: This will all depend upon your intellegence, I have gotten my jewelcraft up to 46 , I started with 20 jewelcraft and worked each gem up in silver till I got
ygData.messageBody:
This will all depend upon your intellegence, I have gotten my jewelcraft up
to 46 , I started with 20 jewelcraft and worked each gem up in silver till I
got trivial message, each Gem gives you about 3-4 points before it is
trivial.

Leaokk
-----Original Message-----
From: jcent@... <jcent@...>
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 11:18 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Jewelry and skill raises


>From: jcent@...
>
>
>Hail and well met, fellow enchanters!
>
>I am Fistlebane, high elf enchanter {of The Rathe server}. I started my
>jewelry making craft fairly recently (after sinking about practice points).
>I found that when I try to use lapis or malachite that I receive a message:
>these items are trivial for your skill level. I stepped up to Cat's Eye
>and made about 5 necklaces with Cat's eye...but got no visible message
>telling me that my skill had raised. I am impatient? How many attempts
>are required, generally, before you see an increase?
>
>Thanks for the feedback.
>
>Fistlebane
>
>
>
